alert.note: Alert for Graham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:22AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Graham County through 145 AM EDT... At 121 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Robbinsville, or over Town Of Santeetlah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Robbinsville, Town Of Santeetlah, Fontana Village, Lake Santeetlah, Fontana Lake, Stecoah, Cheoah, Tapoco and Nantahala. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
